entry.title: $2600 // Renovated 2BR, Sep Kitchen, Stainless Steel, Great for Share/Couple
entry.content:
Large 2BR on quiet, residential street
Separate, renovated kitchen, stainless steel appliances
Spacious living room, lots of sunlight
Great for working professional
Renovated bathroom, wood floors, great closets
Near trains, shops laundry
Mins into the city, or Prospect Park
Guarantors ok :)
Available now

Please call for an appointment: RE BROKER: 646-431-7813
1MONTH Broker fee
